guide.title: Servers
guide.description: Admin REST APIs that operate on the server, that is, the Sync Gateway instance

introduction.paragraph: Admin REST APIs for servers enable administration of servers (Sync Gateway instances).
The following table lists the HTTP methods and URI resource patterns for the Admin REST APIs for servers:

row.entry: Returns a JSON object that contains information about the server, that is, about the Sync Gateway instance.
Returns a list of the names of all databases that are served by the Sync Gateway instance.

Starts and stops Go CPU profiling, which can be useful for diagnosing performance problems. To start profiling, send a JSON body with a file property for which the value is a path to which to write the profile. To stop profiling, send a request without a file property.
